content: these socks are based on my tipsy toe socks 1 but with a few more short row to make the foot and cuff more interesting they are knitted from the toe up with a short row heel unlike the original tipsy toe sock pattern where i used german short row for the toe pattern but not the heel i used only shadow wrap short row here for me these short row looked neater than any other type that i had tried to knit in the round 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tipsy-toe-socks
